item.title: FUBUKI ~zero in on Holoearth~ HOLOLIVE ALTERNATIVE launches April 13
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/fubuki-zero-in-on-holoearth-hololive-alternative-launches-april-13

  • PC

Pixel art high-speed action game dated.

Pixel art high-speed action game FUBUKI ~zero in on Holoearth~ HOLOLIVE ALTERNATIVE will launch for PC via Steam on April 13, publisher Phoenixx and developer PEPOSOFT announced. It will support English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options. A demo is currently available.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

FUBUKI ~zero in on Holoearth~ HOLOLIVE ALTERNATIVE is a high-speed pixel action game where you control the protagonist, Shirakami Fubuki, and battle using swords and skills.

An Exhilarating 2D Pixel Action Adventure With Fubuki Across Holoearth!

You take control of Shirakami Fubuki, one of the Kami residing in Yamato.

With her beloved sword Murasamemaru, she skillfully performs sword fights, high-speed movement, and even wall jumps with ease.

Fight alongside Fubuki, defeat the “Ayakashi” blocking your path, and resolve the anomalies occurring in Holoearth.

(This game is developed with reference to the world settings of the teaser PV and manga of Hololive Alternative. Please note that some content and expressions may differ from the official settings.)

The world of Holoearth is diverse and ever-changing.

Each stage features a completely different appearance, enemies, and mechanics.

Utilize your player skills and the allies you meet along the way to overcome challenging obstacles.

During your adventure, you may encounter Hololive members who have been corrupted by Kegare and turned hostile.

Defeat them to restore their sanity—they will surely lend you their strength once they are back to normal.

If you missed it in February, watch the announcement trailer here.
